ISSUE.TITLE: [bug]: Profile page wrong label
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Current behavior When I enter on the My Account section it says 'Update project' it should be something like 'Update profile' ### Steps to reproduce 1. Go to Workspace Settings 2. Click on 'My Account' 3. Click on 'Profile' 4. See the ### Browser Google Chrome ### Version Cloud
